titleStmt.title: Balme from Gilead, to cure all diseases, especially the plague Foure and twentie sermons on 2 Chron. 7. 13,14. And two sermons of thankesgiuing for Gods deliuerance of London from the plague. Preached anno 1625. in the church of St. Leonard Eastcheape, by H.R. Master of Arts, minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Roborough, Henry, d. 1649?

titleStmt.title: Balme from Gilead, to cure all diseases, especially the plague Foure and twentie sermons on 2 Chron. 7. 13,14. And two sermons of thankesgiuing for Gods deliuerance of London from the plague. Preached anno 1625. in the church of St. Leonard Eastcheape, by H.R. Master of Arts, minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Roborough, Henry, d. 1649?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] N[orton] and A[ugustine] M[athewes] and are to be sold by William Shefford, in Popes-head Ally,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A 2a B-F.
Identified as STC 21129a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Pages 27-8 mutilated, with some loss of text.
